00024 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00025 void SwarmEvent::AddActor(int aid, double p) {
00026         double pNow;
00027         if (!actors.Lookup(aid, pNow))
00028                 pNow = 0;
00029         actors.SetAt(aid, pNow+p);
00030         this->p += pNow+p;
00031 }
00032 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 bool SwarmEvent::OccurredAt(int nFrame) {
00034         if (nFrame >= start && nFrame <= stop) 
00035                 return true; 
00036         else
00037                 return false;
00038 }

00040 void SwarmEvent::Serialize(CArchive& ar) {
00041         if (ar.IsStoring())     {
00042                 ar << id << type << start << stop << p;
00043         }
00044         else {
00045                 ar >> id >> type >> start >> stop >> p;
00046         }
00047         actors.Serialize(ar);
00048 }
00049 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 int SwarmEvent::GetAverageFrameDistance(SwarmEvent *that) {
00051         return abs( (this->stop + this->start)/2 - (that->stop + that->start)/2 );
00052 }

00063 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00064 void SwarmEvent::Add(SwarmEvent *t) {
00065         SwarmEvent* that = dynamic_cast< SwarmEvent* > (t);
00066         if (that == this || that->type.Compare(this->type) != 0 || that->actors.GetCount() == 0)
00067                 return;
00068         this->start = min(this->start, that->start);
00069         this->stop = max(this->stop, that->stop);
00070         POSITION pos = that->actors.GetStartPosition();
00071         while (pos) {
00072                 int id; double p;
00073                 that->actors.GetNextAssoc(pos, id, p);
00074                 this->AddActor(id, p);
00075         }
00076 }
00077 // --------------------- INode overrides ------------------------------------
00078 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00079 double SwarmEvent::Distance(INode *node) {
00080         double DIST_MAX = 1;
00081         SwarmEvent* that = dynamic_cast< SwarmEvent* > (node);
00082         if (that == this || that->type.Compare(this->type) != 0 || that->actors.GetCount() == 0)
00083                 return DIST_MAX;
00084 
00085         // compute time distance
00086         int timeDelta =  max(0, max(that->start - this->stop, this->start - that->stop));
00087         int avgTimeDelta = abs((that->start + that->stop) - (this->start + this->stop) );
00088 
00089         // count matching actors and corresponding likelihoods
00090         int nCommonActors = 0, nAllActors = 0;
00091         double pAllIncoming = 0, pAllNow = 0;
00092         for (POSITION pos = actors.GetStartPosition();pos;) {
00093                 int id; double pNow, pIncoming;
00094                 actors.GetNextAssoc(pos, id, pNow);     
00095                 if (that->actors.Lookup(id, pIncoming)) {
00096                         pAllIncoming += pIncoming;
00097                         pAllNow += pNow;
00098                         nCommonActors++;
00099                 }
00100                 nAllActors++;
00101         }
00102 
00103         // count remaining actors in "that"
00104         for (POSITION pos = that->actors.GetStartPosition();pos;) {
00105                 int id; double dummy;
00106                 that->actors.GetNextAssoc(pos, id, dummy);
00107                 if (!actors.Lookup(id, dummy))
00108                         nAllActors++;
00109         }
00110 
00111         pAllIncoming /= (that->p);
00112         pAllNow /= (this->p);
00113 
00114         // the distance is shorter if more actors match and they are more separated in time
00115         double EPSILON = 10e-3, SHIFT = 100, SCALE = 1000;
00116         double distance = (1 - nCommonActors/nAllActors + EPSILON)*     sigmoid(avgTimeDelta, SHIFT, SCALE);
00117         return distance;
00118 }
00119 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00120 System::String^ SwarmEvent::ToString() {
00121         System::String ^s 
00122                 = System::String::Format("[SwarmEvent],  ID: {0}", id) 
00123                 + System::String::Format(", Type: {0}", gcnew System::String(type))
00124                 + System::String::Format(", Frames: {0}-{1}", start, stop)
00125                 + System::String::Format(", Confidence: {0:F}", p);
00126         POSITION pos = actors.GetStartPosition();
00127         while (pos) {
00128                 int id; double d;
00129                 actors.GetNextAssoc(pos, id, d);
00130                 s += System::String::Format(", ID={0}", id);
00131         }
00132         return s;
00133 };
